name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Proficient Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in Java, C#, and Oracle, complemented by a strong foundation in development tools such as **Eclipse**, **JUnit**, and version control with **Git**. Adept in agile methodologies utilizing **JIRA** and **Confluence** for project management and collaboration. Highly skilled in crafting high-performance applications in both frontend and backend development, leveraging technologies including **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Flutter**.

Demonstrated experience in building AI/ML-powered platforms incorporating predictive analytics, alongside robust expertise in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Proven capability in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Knowledgeable in compliance-driven development frameworks aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards, coupled with a solid background in MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for model management.
